issue-remark.remark: FKOP 02-JUN-15 Please resupply P100 including issue.pdf. Thank you.
MRUNGE 26-MAY-15 TYPESETTER/PRINTER: please note that if an advert file is low resolution, this is the best we can do, so please proceed as is unless lower than 100dpi.

MRUNGE 26-MAY-15 PRINTER: Please send 15 voucher copies to Elsevier GmbH, Urban & Fischer Verlag, Sales Administration, Hackerbrücke 6, 80335 München, Germany, attn. Eva Kraemer (+49 89 53 83 704), immediately upon publication.

MRUNGE 26-MAY-15 TYPESETTER: Paid + filler adverts compiled at P100 by Margreet Runge, Adv. Prod. Dept., on the following pages: IFC, FM vi-vii, p.77, EX1-2 (in between p. 84-85) IBC, OBC. Please see PB Order/IPS for details of adverts to be printed in colour.

MRUNGE 26-MAY-15 PRINTER: Please send 1 voucher copy to Reed Elsevier, APD., 19th Floor Red, Radarweg 29, 1043 NX Amsterdam, The Netherlands, attn. Margreet Runge (+31 20 485 2422), immediately upon publication.
BURMANS001 25-MAY-15 IPS updated. Page range updated 133-134 and rest accordingly.
FKOP 17-APR-15 Note that the items in the sections Journal Club, Buchbesprechungen, and DAF Intern run on. Please update IPS.
